content:
Hi @Sean McIlvenna I am trying to run this trifolia-on-fhir server https://github.com/lantanagroup/trifolia-on-fhir, when I run npm run build-watch:all I am getting an An unhandled exception occurred: Job name "..getProjectMetadata" does not exist.
Could you help me here if I am doing something wrong or any steps I am missing?
Is the repo latest that I could use?

one more way I ran is through dockerfile and I am getting an error Step 11/14 : RUN $(npm bin)/ng build --prod
---> Running in e23ab7871ab0
An unhandled exception occurred: Cannot determine project or target for command.
See "/tmp/ng-FFJFJG/angular-errors.log" for further details.
The command '/bin/sh -c $(npm bin)/ng build --prod' returned a non-zero code: 127
